agrocollect.title: AgroCollect
agrocollect.description:
Mobile app (offline-first) used by an NGO to support agricultural producers across Colombia. 
 I worked in the implementation of a custom CMS for content management, documented user flows, features, and structured the full technical documentation.
This solution enabled data collection without internet access, improving field operations and decision-making for multiple agricultural initiatives.

riskmann.title: RiskMann
riskmann.description:
Inspection platform for tools, equipment, and facilities using customizable templates.
 I contributed to building dynamic interfaces to schedule inspections, manage action plans, and visualize data.
The platform improved the inspection workflow and helped reduce reporting time by centralizing key safety metrics.

iper.title: IPER
iper.description:
Real-time risk matrix management system focused on workplace safety.
 I worked on features to identify, assess, and control risks, enabling tailored action plans per activity.
The system empowered companies to track risk exposure live and comply with local safety regulations more efficiently.

scow.title: SCOW
scow.description:
Security company management platform for handling clients, users, weapons, and ammunition inventory.
 I developed modules for inventory tracking, client management, and internal controls.
The platform streamlined logistics and compliance for companies handling regulated equipment.
